titleStmt.title: A vindication of VViliam Prynne Esquire from some scandalous papers and imputations, nevvly printed and published, to traduce and defame him in his reputation.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: From the Kings head in the Strand, Ian. 10 1648, William Prynne.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
